entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low 10. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of rain or drizzle this evening and 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning. Rain at times heavy beginning late in the morning. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches overnight. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
